snippet: Is chess cool? Judging by a new movie, Vogue magazine, a book and a pop star’s comments, it is.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column observes game is subject of new documentary film, Vogue magazine article, book and comments by pop star Carly Rae Jepsen.
lead_paragraph: Is chess cool? Judging by a new movie, Vogue magazine, a book and a pop star’s comments, it is.

headline.main: The Game Gets a Moment in Pop Culture’s Spotlight
headline.print_headline: The Game Gets a Moment In Pop Culture’s Spotlight
